name: Memory (Qdrant)
description: 本地语义记忆系统（Qdrant + Transformers.js，完全本地运行）

qdrantUrl.description: Qdrant 服务地址（留空使用内存模式）

persistToDisk.description: Save memories to disk in memory mode (stored in ~/.openclaw-memory/)

storagePath.description: Custom storage path for disk persistence (leave empty for default ~/.openclaw-memory/)

allowPIICapture.description: Allow capturing text containing PII (emails, phone numbers). Only applies when autoCapture is enabled.

maxMemorySize.description: Maximum number of memories in in-memory mode. Set to 999999 for unlimited (oldest memories are auto-deleted when limit is reached, except when set to 999999)

qdrantUrl.label: Qdrant URL
qdrantUrl.placeholder: Leave empty for in-memory mode (zero config)
qdrantUrl.help: External Qdrant server URL. Leave empty to use in-memory storage.

persistToDisk.label: Persist to Disk
persistToDisk.help: Save memories to disk in memory mode. Data will be stored in ~/.openclaw-memory/ and survive restarts. Only applies when Qdrant URL is empty.

storagePath.label: Storage Path
storagePath.help: Custom directory for storing memories. Leave empty to use default (~/.openclaw-memory/). Only applies when persistToDisk is enabled.

autoCapture.label: Auto Capture
autoCapture.help: ⚠️ PRIVACY: Auto-save conversation content. Text containing PII (emails, phone numbers) will be skipped unless 'Allow PII Capture' is enabled. Disabled by default for privacy.

allowPIICapture.label: Allow PII Capture
allowPIICapture.help: ⚠️ PRIVACY RISK: Allow capturing text with emails/phone numbers when autoCapture is enabled. Only enable if you understand the privacy implications. Requires autoCapture to be enabled.

maxMemorySize.label: Max Memory Size (In-Memory Mode)
maxMemorySize.help: Maximum number of memories stored in in-memory mode. When limit is reached, oldest memories are automatically deleted (LRU eviction). Set to 999999 for unlimited storage. Only applies to in-memory mode, not external Qdrant.
